reviewText: This movie The Case for Christmas  starring Dean Cain and Rachel Blanchard. This movie is about a young lawyer named Michael Sherman (Dean Cain) and a single father.  When Santa comes to Michael's law term looking for a lawyer. Michael agrees to be Kris Kringle (Santa) lawyer when he is being sued for ruining Christmas.  Watch this movie to see what happens to Santa.  Also watch this to see if Michael finds love again. This is a good movie. Enjoy!

reviewText: I like Dean Cain and always enjoy him in these kinds of movies.  He has played other roles that I found less flatering for him but I am not a critic so really can't say.  I liked him in this.  He strikes me as a decent, kind man and that comes through with his acting.  Good movie...I was definitely rooting for SANTA!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Santa ends up getting sued...yes, someone sued Mr. Claus himself! Luckily Michael Sherman (Dean Cain) is just the lawyer to represent him. Wanting to prove the Santa does exist the case becomes very important. Knowing that this could make him look like a fool he pushes on anyway. He wants to make the entire town believe in Santa and that is just what he will try to do in 'The Case for Christmas.'In this holiday keeper Dean Cain plays a single dad who is working hard to take care of his daughter, but also wants to show her the real meaning of Christmas. This fun, family friendly movie is sure to become a holiday movie tradition!

reviewText: I really enjoyed this movie.  I'm a hopeless romantic and this one hit my fancy.  It's for people that believe in the spirit of Christmas and what it's all about.  I'm sure there are many skeptics regarding it's content but I loved it.  It was a cute romantic comedy of loss and restoration.  Moving on in one's life after tragedy and seeing the impossible when you believe.
